privacy.privacyDesc: Avatar is designed with privacy at its core. Your data stays on your device.
privacy.localOnlyDesc: All conversations, settings, and API keys are stored locally on your device (MMKV + SQLite). No data is sent to third-party servers.
privacy.apiKeyDesc: API keys are stored on-device only. They are sent directly to your configured provider endpoints and never pass through any intermediate servers.
privacy.noCloudDesc: No data is uploaded to any cloud service. You can use the backup/restore feature to transfer data between devices.
privacy.microphoneDesc: Used for voice input. Only active when you press the mic button.
privacy.cameraDesc: Used for scanning QR codes and capturing images for vision models.
privacy.photoLibraryDesc: Used for attaching images to conversations with vision-capable models.
privacy.dataManagementDesc: You can export or delete all your data at any time from the Settings page. We do not collect analytics or telemetry data.
